rules_text:
At the beginning of the next upkeep, untap all noncreature permanents you control and draw a card.
Exile Tempus Fugit.
flavor_text:
[i]“Seconds lapsed into minutes into hours into days, months, years. The watch ran empty, and in the end, all that was left was spent time.”
—Azamir, The Last Chronomancer[/i]
notes: fluffy: put exile on own line (timing wonk, Stunning Reversal vs Game Plan), -dashgap
